snippet: The theater in New Hope, Pa., has announced that Robyn Goodman will be the theater’s new executive producer and that Alexander Fraser will be the new producing director.
abstract: Bucks County Playhouse in New Hope, Pa, announces that Robyn Goodman will be theater's new executive producer and that Alexander Fraser will be new producing director.
lead_paragraph: The theater in New Hope, Pa., has announced that Robyn Goodman will be the theater’s new executive producer and that Alexander Fraser will be the new producing director.

headline.main: New Leaders for Bucks County Playhouse
